title: Scrum Pulse
description: Scrum Pulse is your ultimate planning poker and sprint estimation tool, designed for Agile teams and Scrum masters. faster, and more effective planning sessions.
footerDescription: Simplify your Agile planning. Estimate stories quickly and run efficient sprint planning with Scrum Pulse.

features.title: Sprint Planning
features.description: Plan and manage your sprints with intuitive drag-and-drop interface and backlog management.

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Keep your team aligned with real-time updates, comments, and notifications.

features.title: Progress Tracking
features.description: Monitor your team's progress with beautiful charts and comprehensive reporting.

features.title: Calendar Integration
features.description: Seamlessly integrate with your calendar for sprint planning and daily standups.

features.title: Real-time Chat
features.description: Communicate with your team members instantly with built-in messaging.

features.title: Mobile Ready
features.description: Access your projects anywhere with our fully responsive mobile application.

aboutUs.title: About Scrum Pulse
aboutUs.description: We are a passionate team of developers and project managers who understand the challenges of modern software development. Our mission is to create tools that make agile project management simple, efficient, and enjoyable for teams of all sizes.
